summary: Comprehensive testing of padel tournament management system completed. Backend APIs mostly functional (86.7% success rate), frontend UI working well with good navigation and authentication. Some minor backend issues with tournament creation and CORS configuration.

critical_bugs.issue: Returns 520 error when creating tournaments via POST

flaky_endpoints.workaround: This is expected behavior, not a bug

cors_issues.issue: CORS policy blocking requests with credentials
cors_issues.symptoms: Access-Control-Allow-Origin header conflicts with credentials mode 'include'

integration_issues.issue: Form validation working but registration may not complete successfully

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and features
Tournament listing with search and filters
Tournament detail page with registration info
Ranking page with APA points display
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix tournament creation endpoint (520 error) and resolve CORS configuration for credentials. The create tournament API is failing with server error which blocks admin functionality.
